message: Hello Bob, I'm offering you the opportunity to purchase this product for $11,000. I believe it will be highly beneficial to you.
Thanks for the offer, Alice. I'm interested, but $11,000 is a bit steep for me. How about we settle around $9,000?

I appreciate your interest, Bob. While $9,000 is a tempting offer, the true value of this product is significantly higher. Could you consider $10,500? I'm confident you'll see a considerable return on your investment.
I understand the value, Alice, but I have a budget in mind. Would you be willing to meet me halfway at $9,750?
